function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation systems in the workplace","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among workers","Mitigation":"Improvement of ventilation systems and use of high-efficiency air filters","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filters, ventilation system upgrades","People":"Workers in high-risk jobs","Owner":"Employers"},{"Description":"Poorly ventilated indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission due to airborne aerosols","Mitigation":"Improvement of ventilation systems and control of indoor air quality","Technologies":"Indoor air quality monitoring systems, ventilation system upgrades","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Risk of airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission due to aerosol particles remaining suspended in the air","Mitigation":"Implementation of control measures for indoor air quality and ventilation","Technologies":"Indoor air quality monitoring systems, use of physical barriers","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
